title: Bayer shares soar 12% after key U.S. legal win against Roundup cancer claims
content: Bayer shares rose as the company said it scored a legal victory in its suit over claims that exposure to its popular Roundup weed killer led to cancer.
summary: Bayer shares rose as the company said it scored a legal victory in its suit over claims that exposure to its popular Roundup weed killer led to cancer.

title: Mpox vaccine maker Bavarian Nordic seeks ‘critical’ EU approval for teens after WHO declares health emergency
content: CEO Paul Chaplin told CNBC that the expanded approval for 12 to 17 year-olds would be crucial in tackling the latest outbreak.
summary: CEO Paul Chaplin told CNBC that the expanded approval for 12 to 17 year-olds would be crucial in tackling the latest outbreak.

title: Europe stocks higher to round off winning week; Sterling gains after slew of UK data
content: European stocks were higher as the Stoxx 600 index continues to climb.
summary: European stocks were higher as the Stoxx 600 index continues to climb.

title: Alibaba, JD.com results underscore the slowdown in Chinese consumer demand
content: Second-quarter results from Chinese e-commerce giants Alibaba and JD.com indicate a weak market, with domestic and foreign players struggling to attract customers.
summary: Second-quarter results from Chinese e-commerce giants Alibaba and JD.com indicate a weak market, with domestic and foreign players struggling to attract customers.

title: Replacing China in copper supply chain is 'unfeasible,' warns WoodMac, as the West seeks shift
content: Efforts from Western economies to diversify away from China's copper supply chain could raise costs and delay the energy transition, says Wood Mackenzie.
summary: Efforts from Western economies to diversify away from China's copper supply chain could raise costs and delay the energy transition, says Wood Mackenzie.

title: After medic's rape and murder, Indian doctors stage 24-hour nationwide strike
content: The Indian Medical Association has called for a suspension of non-emergency medical services from Saturday 6 am local time.
summary: The Indian Medical Association has called for a suspension of non-emergency medical services from Saturday 6 am local time.

title: China's central bank says risks from local government debt have dropped
content: China's financial risks have dropped, including from local government debt, People's Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said in interviews with state media.
summary: China's financial risks have dropped, including from local government debt, People's Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said in interviews with state media.

title: Japan's Nikkei soars over 3% to clock best week in 4 years amid a broad rally in Asia markets
content: Traders in Asia digested non-oil exports data from Singapore, which massively beat Reuters' poll expectations
summary: Traders in Asia digested non-oil exports data from Singapore, which massively beat Reuters' poll expectations

title: China's new loans hit a 15-year low, but investors 'should not panic'
content: China extended just 260 billion yuan of new loans in July, far less than the 450 billion yuan expected.
summary: China extended just 260 billion yuan of new loans in July, far less than the 450 billion yuan expected.

title: North Korea to reopen for international visitors, tour operators say
content: North Korea will resume international tourism this winter, ending a COVID-era ban on travelers, according to operators that organize trips to the country.
summary: North Korea will resume international tourism this winter, ending a COVID-era ban on travelers, according to operators that organize trips to the country.

title: 'I see a lot of denial': C-suite advisor says business bosses still expect a Trump win
content: U.S. business leaders are "in denial" about Kamala Harris' growing lead over Donald Trump, according to C-suite advisor Tina Fordham.
summary: U.S. business leaders are "in denial" about Kamala Harris' growing lead over Donald Trump, according to C-suite advisor Tina Fordham.

title: TikTok 'finfluencers' accurately called the AI rally, but credibility concerns dog them
content: Experts warned against trusting advice from these finfluencers, but agreed that they provide a  first step to promote investing awareness among young investors.
summary: Experts warned against trusting advice from these finfluencers, but agreed that they provide a  first step to promote investing awareness among young investors.

title: Warren Buffett did something curious with his Apple stock holding
content: The identical 400 million share count in Apple and Buffett's oldest and longest position Coca-Cola prompted some to believe he is done selling the tech stock.
summary: The identical 400 million share count in Apple and Buffett's oldest and longest position Coca-Cola prompted some to believe he is done selling the tech stock.

title: A $1.4 million vacation? Take a look inside a yacht that costs that much per week
content:
The 255-foot superyacht Malia hit the market in 2023 with a price tag of $120 million.
But she can be yours for $1.4 million per week.
summary:
The 255-foot superyacht Malia hit the market in 2023 with a price tag of $120 million.
But she can be yours for $1.4 million per week.

title: Alibaba earnings miss expectations despite cloud acceleration
content: Alibaba continues to face headwinds in its core e-commerce business amid rising competition and a cautious Chinese consumer.
summary: Alibaba continues to face headwinds in its core e-commerce business amid rising competition and a cautious Chinese consumer.

title: Ex-Google CEO Eric Schmidt sees Nvidia as big AI winner: 'You know what to do in the stock market'
content: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in a recent talk at Stanford that, while he isn't giving investment advice, Nvidia is the top beneficiary of the AI boom.
summary: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in a recent talk at Stanford that, while he isn't giving investment advice, Nvidia is the top beneficiary of the AI boom.

title: China's bond market intervention reveals financial stability worries
content: The country's latest efforts to stem a bond market rally shows that authorities are worried about financial stability, analysts said.
summary: The country's latest efforts to stem a bond market rally shows that authorities are worried about financial stability, analysts said.

title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg receives letter from lawmakers concerned about illicit drug ads on Facebook and Instagram
content: A bipartisan group of lawmakers sent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg a letter expressing concern about illicit drug advertisements running on the company's apps.
summary: A bipartisan group of lawmakers sent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg a letter expressing concern about illicit drug advertisements running on the company's apps.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: Could Hindenburg's latest allegations have wider implications for India?
content: Unusually, Hindenburg — a short-seller that makes money when stocks fall — is attacking a market regulator, rather than a specific stock.
summary: Unusually, Hindenburg — a short-seller that makes money when stocks fall — is attacking a market regulator, rather than a specific stock.

title: Tencent-backed Airwallex hits $500 million annualized sales, aims to get IPO-ready by 2026
content: Payments startup Airwallex has reached an annual revenue run rate of $500 million and will be ready for an IPO by 2026, CEO Jack Zhang told CNBC.
summary: Payments startup Airwallex has reached an annual revenue run rate of $500 million and will be ready for an IPO by 2026, CEO Jack Zhang told CNBC.

title: Goldman Sachs jumps into bitcoin ETFs and one hedge fund gets bullish on miners
content: New SEC filings show banks and hedge funds jumping into spot crypto products, though ether ETFs won't be accounted for until November.
summary: New SEC filings show banks and hedge funds jumping into spot crypto products, though ether ETFs won't be accounted for until November.

title: Cisco shares have best day since 2020 on earnings beat, plans to cut 7% of workforce
content: Cisco shares jumped on Thursday and were on pace for their best day since November 2020, after the networking company announced layoffs and an earnings beat.
summary: Cisco shares jumped on Thursday and were on pace for their best day since November 2020, after the networking company announced layoffs and an earnings beat.

title: United CEO expresses 'renewed confidence' in Boeing after meeting with new leader Ortberg
content: United's CEO Kirby had lunch with Boeing's new CEO Kelly Ortberg in Texas this week.
summary: United's CEO Kirby had lunch with Boeing's new CEO Kelly Ortberg in Texas this week.

title: Wizz Air launches $550 'all you can fly' annual subscription pass
content: Travelers in Europe can now take unlimited flights for 499 euros ($550) a year under a new travel subscription service from budget carrier Wizz Air.
summary: Travelers in Europe can now take unlimited flights for 499 euros ($550) a year under a new travel subscription service from budget carrier Wizz Air.

title: Health stocks jump as WHO declares mpox global health emergency
content: Shares of Danish vaccine maker Bavarian Nordic jumped as much as 17% Thursday amid a wider rally for associated healthcare stocks following the WHO declaration.
summary: Shares of Danish vaccine maker Bavarian Nordic jumped as much as 17% Thursday amid a wider rally for associated healthcare stocks following the WHO declaration.

title: Biden administration releases prices of 10 drugs in Medicare negotiations, says U.S. will save $6 billion in first year
content: It is a milestone in a controversial process that aims to make costly medications more affordable for older Americans but is strongly opposed by drugmakers.
summary: It is a milestone in a controversial process that aims to make costly medications more affordable for older Americans but is strongly opposed by drugmakers.

title: Amazon to test Prime Air drone delivery service in the UK
content: Amazon and six other organizations will take part in a trial that will test the use of drone flights to remote locations.
summary: Amazon and six other organizations will take part in a trial that will test the use of drone flights to remote locations.

title: Ukraine must decide how its Russian incursion ends — advance further or retreat before it's too late
content: Ukraine must decide whether to try to hold or advance its incursion, or to withdraw now before Russia mounts what could be a furious and deadly response.
summary: Ukraine must decide whether to try to hold or advance its incursion, or to withdraw now before Russia mounts what could be a furious and deadly response.

title: Klarna takes on banks with a personal account and cashback rewards ahead of IPO
content: Klarna, best known for its buy now, pay later loans, is launching a personal account for deposits and cashback rewards in the U.S. and Europe.
summary: Klarna, best known for its buy now, pay later loans, is launching a personal account for deposits and cashback rewards in the U.S. and Europe.

title: Consumer spending jumped in July as retail sales were up 1%, much better than expected
content: Retail sales were projected to increase 0.3% in July, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.
summary: Retail sales were projected to increase 0.3% in July, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.
